summary: This appears to be an email transmitting a lieutenant's log and daily activity report from July 28, 2019, related to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The date corresponds to the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death, making it a potentially significant administrative record from the facility where he was held.

events.title: MCC Lieutenant's Log and Daily Activity Report
events.description: A lieutenant's log and daily activity report was generated for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. This is a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.

events.title: Transmission of MCC Reports
events.description: An email was sent transmitting the lieutenant's log and daily activity report from July 28, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a transmission email for a lieutenant's log and daily activity report dated July 28, 2019.
The report originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, ZIP code 10007, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
The date of the report (July 28, 2019) is the day before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, making it a potentially relevant record for investigations into the circumstances surrounding his death.
The document includes attachments: TEXT.htm, LIEUTENANT'S_LOG_07-28-2019.docm, and Daily_Activities_Report_7-28-2019.docx.
The email was sent on July 29, 2019, at 10:00:16 UTC, indicating the report was transmitted the day after the activities it documents.
